One Level Up Top Level

vim-k/ftplugin/k.vim - ngnksource

  1. setl sw=1 ts=1 sts=1 inc=^\\l cms=/%s inde=KIndent(v:lnum)
  2. fu!KIndent(l)
  3. let p=prevnonblank(v:lnum-1)|let s=getline(p)
  4. if s=~'[(\[{] *\(/.*\)\=$'|retu indent(p)+1|en
  5. if s=~'[)\]}] *\(/.*\)\=$'|retu 0|en
  6. let n=len(s)|let i=0|let t=[]
  7. wh i<n
  8.   let c=s[i]
  9.   if    c=='"'                   |let i+=1|wh i<n&&s[i]!='"'|let i+=1+(s[i]=='\')|endw
  10.   elsei c=='/'&&(!i||s[i-1]==' ')|break
  11.   elsei c=~'[([{]'               |cal add(t,i+1)
  12.   elsei c=~'[)\]}]'              |if len(t)>0|cal remove(t,-1)|en
  13.   en
  14.   let i+=1
  15. endw
  16. retu len(t)?t[-1]:indent(p)
  17. endf

One Level Up Top Level
